steps.description: Measure and add-1.5 tbsp sugar to the mixing bowl

errors.description: Used a mug instead of mixing bowl

steps.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tbsp flour to the mixing bowl

errors.description: Did not clean the measuring cup before scooping flour and adding it to the cup

steps.description: Measure and add-1/4 tsp baking powder to the bowl

errors.description: Spill powder while opening the cup

steps.description: Place-Place the paper cupcake liner inside the mug
Measure and add-a pinch of salt to the mixing bowl

errors.description: Dropping salt outside while adding it to the bowl

steps.description: Whisk-Whisk to combine mixture of flour, sugar and baking powder in the bowl
Measure and add-2 tbsp water to the bowl

errors.description: Dropping and adding water while measuring

steps.description: Measure and add-1/4 tsp vanilla extract to the bowl

errors.description: Spilling vanilla extract while measuring and adding it to the mug

steps.description: Whisk-Whisk batter until no lumps remain
Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tsp vegetable oil to the bowl

errors.description: Dropping the vegetable oil bottle and spilling the oil on the kitchen top
Adding more than 2 tsp oil to the mug

steps.description: Microwave-Microwave the mug and batter on high power for 60 seconds. Check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it. If wet batter clings to the toothpick, microwave for an additional 5 seconds. If the toothpick comes out clean, continue
Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a plate
Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Scoop 4 spoonfuls of chocolate frosting into a zip-top bag

errors.description: Using only 1.5 spoons of frosting instead of 4 spoons

steps.description: cut-Use scissors to cut one corner from the bag to create a small opening 1/4 inch in diameter
Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the plate in a circle around the base of the cake

errors.description: Squeezing on top of the cake instead of a circle around the base of the cake
remove-then carefully remove the paper liner
Allow-Allow to cool until it is no longer hot to the touch
seal-seal zip top bag, removing as much air as possible
